backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user and vendor profile management, menu CRUD, authorization checks, and vendor listing sorted by location.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for landing, customer, and vendor pages with AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout with navigation, Internet Identity auth handling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Login gate prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity before accessing protected views.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting users to enter their name and vendor status, then saves the profile via mutation.
Restricts access to vendor-only areas by checking the user profile and showing setup or error states as needed.
frontend/src/components/customer/Custome: Displays vendor search, filters, a list, and a map, handling loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/customer/VendorD: Slide-out panel showing detailed vendor info including contact, location, and menu with availability.
frontend/src/components/customer/VendorL: Scrollable list of vendors with basic info, highlighting the selected vendor and item availability.
frontend/src/components/map/OsmVendorMap: Initializes a Leaflet map, loads markers for vendors, and updates selection on marker click.
frontend/src/components/states/EmptyStat: Generic empty-state component displaying an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/states/ErrorStat: Error display component with message and optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/states/LoadingSt: Loading spinner component with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/vendor/LocationP: Loads Leaflet dynamically and lets vendors set or update their map location with a draggable marker.
frontend/src/components/vendor/MenuItems: Provides UI to create, edit, and delete vendor menu items using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Dashboard with tabbed navigation for editing vendor profile, menu, and location.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for viewing and updating a vendor’s profile details via upsert mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useAuthMuta: Mutation hook for saving the logged‑in user's profile and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useVendorMu: Mutation hooks for updating vendor profiles and managing menu items with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthProfil: Query hook for fetching the current user's profile using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useVendors.ts: Query hooks for listing vendors, fetching a vendor by ID, and getting the caller vendor profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortalPage.ts: Loads customer portal, showing a loader, auth gate, or the customer browse view depending on identity state.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero, features, and navigation buttons for customer or vendor portals.
frontend/src/pages/VendorPortalPage.tsx: Loads vendor portal with loading state, auth gate, vendor gate, and vendor dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins matching the theme’s OKLCH variables.
project_state.json: Tracks overall project state, features, requirements, assets, and architectural notes for LocalBuddy.
